name: Dodge Roll (MBPpp)
description:
In Dodge Roll, you make your way through a randomly generated dungeon while being relentlessly attacked by a monster that is hidden away somewhere in the dungeon. You can't attack on command, so to hurt the enemy, you must first find them, and then pick up the dice that spawn on the ground, which will do a random amount of damage

Dodge Roll is made in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2022 by two 17-year-olds with little game development experience.

There may be bugs, so please be aware of that and rate the game appropriately.

Controls:

WASD - Move.

That's it.

kind of ironic how we don't actually have a dodge roll.
